# Guskey Framework

```{r guskey-framework, echo = F}
time_diff <- Sys.Date() - as.Date("2019-01-01")
year_diff <- round(as.numeric(time_diff) / 365)
galleries3 <- tibble::tibble(
  long_name = c(
    "Guskey Framework Part 1: Participant Perceptions/Feedback",
    "Guskey Framework Part 2: Participant Learning/Educator Surveys"
  ),
  blurb = c(
    "An exploration of part 1 of the Teaching Lab framework...",
    "An exploration of part 2 of the Teaching Lab framework..."
  ),
  image_url = c(
    here::here("Images/Visualizations/Reviews.png"),
    here::here("Images/Visualizations/SpendingperKid.png")
  ),
  link = c(
    "https://teachinglab.github.io/TLReviews.html",
    "https://teachinglab.github.io/USStateSpendingperKid.html"
  )
)

galleries3 |>
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    layout = "label-below",
    width = 2,
    spacing = 3
  )
```
